title: PromptObject
description: Official AEOph PromptObject Schema â€” the standard format for registering prompts and ensuring traceable AI/Answer Engine citation.

prompt.description: The main prompt text or question intended for AI/Answer engines.

prompt-ID.description: Unique identifier for the prompt within AEOph/PromptVault.

prompt-Date.description: Date the prompt was first publicly registered.

prompt-Hash.description: SHA256 hash of the raw prompt (base hash used for verification).

prompt-FullHash.description: Composite hash of (prompt + prompt-Hash + prompt-Date + prompt-Owner + prompt-URL).

prompt-Status.description: Lifecycle state of the prompt license/availability.

prompt-Citation.description: Citation rule when the prompt (or its outputs) are used.

prompt-Owner.description: Verified owner or entity claiming authorship.

prompt-URL.description: Canonical public URL where this prompt is published/registered.
